modName: Serpents and Co. Armies - Followers and Mounts
summary: This mod adds Summonable Reptiles: 3 Snakes + 2 Crocodiles (Mounts) + 1 Turtle (Follower), and Eggs of Crocodiles or Turtles (Hordes/Armies). NO DLC NEEDED.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Summonable Reptiles: 3 Snakes + 2 Crocodiles (Mounts) + 1 Turtle (Follower), and Eggs of Crocodiles or Turtles (Hordes/Armies). NO DLC NEEDED.

[b]The models are not perfect, the game limits the possibilities (The crocodiles do not move their legs, the turtle moves like a ... mammoth! The snakes can get stuck in the obstacles). I did my best and the result is quite suitable .. It's up to you to play![/b]

[i]Les modèles ne sont pas parfaits, le jeu limite les possibilités (Les crocodiles ne bougent pas leurs pattes, la tortue se déplace comme un ... mammouth! Les serpents peuvent se coincer dans les obstacles). J'ai fait de mon mieux et le résultat est plutôt convenable.. A vous de jouer![/i]

[url=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18080708103716616015838523.jpg][img]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/08/07//18080708103716616015838523.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=5]SUMMONABLE REPTILES[/size][/b][/color]


To have the SUMMONABLE REPTILES, you must buy the (7) “Spell tome: Summon XXX” at [b][color=#00ff00]Farengar[/color][/b][color=#00ff00] Secret-Fire[/color] in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the book, you have the (7) spells (Duration of the summon: 1 hour) ...

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Reptiles"

In order to buy the 8 books at Farengar, you must place this mod at the bottom of the list when you launch the game


[color=#ff0000][size=5][b]HORDES/ARMIES of Crocodiles or Turtles[/b][/size][/color] (incubated eggs/scrolls)


You can quickly incubate eggs of Crocos/Tortoises with the fire of the forge, and quickly create hordes of Crocos/Tortoises (5, 15, 50 .. MORE ?.. ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer)

To obtain these eggs simply bring any Crocos/Tortoises Eggs with some Merchants in [b]Falkreath[/b] ([i][color=#00ff00]Valga Vinicia of the Dead Man's Drink, Solaf of the Gray Pine Goods, Zaria of the Grave Concoctions[/color][/i]) to a forge and create the Incubated Eggs in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Crocos/Tortoises


[color=#ff0000][size=5][b]HORDES/ARMIES of Snakes[/b][/size][/color] (scrolls)


To obtain these snakes, simply buy scrolls found with some Merchants in [b]Falkreath[/b] ([i][color=#00ff00]Valga Vinicia of the Dead Man's Drink, Solaf of the Gray Pine Goods, Zaria of the Grave Concoctions[/color][/i]). Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into snakes …




[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/size][/color]

In order to find these eggs/books at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game



[size=4][b][color=#ff0000]CREDITS[/color][/b][/size]

[color=#ff0000]Mihail Romanov[/color] for the Snakes in his mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92870] Serpents- Elements of Skyrim pt.18 (mihail immersive add-ons- reptiles- snakes) [/url] and for the Crocodiles in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88150] Crocodiles- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - ESO- reptiles) [/url]
[color=#ff0000] SpikeDragonLord and jboyd4 [/color] for the Turtle in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76203/?] Beasts of Tamriel [/url]
